My writing for Amazon has been focused on apparel. The goal is to provide the consumer with information about different types of apparel within broader categories, such as jackets or sweaters, in order to guide the customer through their purchases and help them make decisions. Essentially, the copy functions as a mini-buying guide and helps to increase conversion rates for undecided shoppers.
